meta.title: Exchange Policy | Blckorack
meta.description: Learn about the exchange policy for Blckorack. We ensure an easy and transparent process if your order doesn’t fit as expected.
meta.keywords: exchange policy, exchange, size exchange, Blckorack, streetwear exchange

policy.introduction: At Blckorack, we value your trust and aim to provide you with the best shopping experience. If your order doesn’t fit as expected, you can easily exchange it for a different size under the following terms and conditions:

sections.title: Exchange Booking
sections.content: Exchange requests must be booked within 48 hours of delivery. To initiate an exchange, please DM us on Instagram at @blckorack.in.

sections.title: Exchange Pickup
sections.content: Once your exchange is booked, a delivery partner will pick up the product from your address within 48 hours.

sections.title: Exchange Charges
sections.content: A ₹150 exchange charge will be applicable. This amount covers the pickup and re-shipping process and must be paid before dispatch of the exchanged item.

sections.title: Quality Check & Processing
sections.content: Once the product reaches our warehouse, it will undergo a Quality Check (QC). After successful QC approval, the new size will be shipped to you.

sections.title: Timelines
sections.content: The complete exchange process usually takes 6–7 working days from the date of pickup.

sections.title: Important Note
sections.content:
• Products must be returned in their original condition, with tags and packaging intact.
• Exchanges are only applicable for size issues and are subject to product availability.
• Products that fail QC or are found to be worn/used will not be eligible for exchange.
